title: BRIEF-Reward Minerals Provides Lake Disappointment Project Environmental Permitting Update
text:
BRIEF-Reward Minerals Provides Lake Disappointment Project Environmental Permitting Update

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 17, 2019 16:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Reward Minerals Provides Lake Disappointment Project Environmental Permitting Update Sept 17 (Reuters) - Reward Minerals Ltd : * PROVIDES LAKE DISAPPOINTMENT PROJECT ENVIRONMENTAL PERMITTING UPDATE * ANTICIPATED THAT COMPANY WILL MEET WITH EPA BOARD TO CONSIDER PROPOSAL BEFORE END OF OCT 2019 * RECEIVED NOTIFICATION FROM DEPARTMENT OF WATER AND ENVIRONMENTAL REGULATION OF WESTERN AUSTRALIA (EPA SERVICES DIVISION) * REGULATOR COMPLETES REVIEW OF RESPONSE TO CO'S SUBMISSIONS DOCUMENT FOR ITS LAKE DISAPPOINTMENT SOP PROJECT

BRIEF-Reward Minerals Provides Lake Disappointment Project Environmental Permitting Update
description: BRIEF-Reward Minerals Provides Lake Disappointment Project Environmental Permitting Update
